Job Description:
Cognitiv builds custom programmatic ad buying algorithms using the latest advances in Deep Learning. Our platform NeuralMind ™ enables us to offer custom algorithms to all our clients, advertisers to build custom algorithms for all of their brands and ROI-types, and agencies to offer more sophisticated targeting solutions to its programmatic clients. NeuralMind™ considers thousands of inputs at once – including context, time, user habits, weather, available inventory, and expected win price – all to optimize results from ad buying, audience building, and search advertising.
Overview
The Features team within the Research and Development group at Cognitiv is a highly visible team that plays a critical role in the success of our product and clients. Our team is responsible for designing and developing new features for use in Cognitiv’s deep learning models. This involves using standard software and feature engineering practices as well as implementing the latest and greatest in deep learning research. You will work side-by-side with machine learning research scientists, software engineers, and others so will get to flex many muscles.

At AFS, you will be called on to build and lead a diverse team of systems and data engineers, front-end developers, and annotators building a machine learning and artificial intelligence platform to tackle meaningful real-world problems in commercial agriculture. FruitScout is building a computer-vision based implementation of the precision crop load management system developed by researchers at leading universities in agriculture (e.g. Cornell, UMass-Amherst, MSU, WSU).
We seek team members who want to learn and teach, who value diversity of opinion and experience, and who embrace the challenges and opportunities presented by being a part of a remote team.
You will work closely with with the technical CEO and founder
Lead the product team that includes mobile, front-end, cloud platform, machine learning engineers and the annotation personnel.

Your Job
We're looking for a Software Engineer to use their expertise in big data and/or machine learning to solve problems like high performing serving and rendering, ads ranking, personalized targeting etc.
Experiment and build ad systems that help employers find the best candidates and help job seekers find their dream jobs.
Help scale a data infrastructure for our massive sets of data to enable millions of database lookups.
Help scale a data pipeline for real-time processing of enormous amounts of user behavioral data.
Have ownership over the things you build, help shape the product and technical vision, direction, and how we iterate.

We are Mythical Games. A venture-backed next-generation game technology company at the intersection of video games and economics led by industry veterans. Our goal is to lead the industry with the launch of exceptional video game experiences that leverage distributed ledger technology, while also providing a platform of robust tools that will allow any other game developers to do the same.
ABOUT THE ROLE:
We are looking for a highly skilled Sr. Software Engineer with a proven track record performing statistical analysis, prediction, and recommendation on diverse and large-scale e-commerce datasets preferably. In this role, you will be responsible for delivering models in production that optimize marketplace interactions, generate insights, and detect anomalies among other things. While this role is production-focused, as one of the first members, you will be critical for the development of Data Science at Mythical Games.

Sense’s mission is to reduce global carbon emissions by making homes smart and efficient. We make it easier for people to take care of their homes and to actively participate in a cleaner, more resilient future. We’re serious about having a real impact on climate change.
To accomplish this mission, we are building an AI and automation platform for home energy infrastructure. Come join the Data Science team and ship a great consumer product built on our unique machine learning technology. We have a wide range of interesting technical challenges that span rich time-series data analysis, supervised and unsupervised machine learning, embedded and the cloud, and a team of highly curious, collaborative data scientists and engineers who enjoy solving hard problems together.
If the idea of having a significant positive impact on the product sounds exciting to you, let's talk!
